settings.text: “I Read this BEFORE you scrub your toilet again in 2026.”

As a senior woman, I know firsthand how frustrating facial hair can be. Thinning, sensitive skin makes traditional hair removal methods like waxing and tweezing a painful, time-consuming chore.

Not to mention how much shaving every day dries out mature, sensitive skin. 

So I was thrilled when my daughter gifted me the Pluxy Epil Pro Essentials set last Christmas. This game-changing kit has everything you need for gentle, effective, and long-lasting hair removal at home and 6 other bonus treatments that keep me looking barely 45!

Here are 10 reasons why it's the perfect gift for any woman over 60:
TLDR: TrueClean prevents toilet stains automatically with every flush — so you stop scrubbing and start living. Here are 10 reasons hard water homeowners are making the switch.

settings.heading: 1. It Prevents Stains Before They Form (So You Finally Stop Scrubbing)
settings.text:
Here's the problem with everything you've tried: bleach, pumice stones, expensive cleaners — they all attack stains after they form. You scrub. It comes back in 3 days. You scrub again.

TrueClean releases a cleaning solution with every single flush — before new minerals stick to your bowl. 

No bond. No stain. No scrubbing.

settings.heading: 2. It Actually Works on Hard Water (Unlike Everything Else)
settings.text:
If you live in CA, AZ, TX, DC, or FL — you know what I’m talking about.

Those stubborn brown rings. The rust-colored streaks. The crusty mineral buildup that mock you and your scrub brush.

TrueClean's chlorine-based formula was engineered to break down and disperse hard water minerals so those ugly brown rings never form to begin with.

settings.heading: 3. It Works Automatically With Every Flush
settings.text:
Clip it to your overflow tube. Walk away. Done in 60 seconds  — no tools, no plumber, no complicated installation.

Every flush releases a precise dose of cleaning solution directly into your bowl. You don't have to remember anything. You don't have to do anything.

Your toilet cleans itself while you sleep, while you're at work, while you're living your life.

settings.heading: 4. Stop Scrubbing Every Week
settings.text:
How many hours have you spent scrubbing toilets over the years?

I was scrubbing my toilet every week. I used to ruin so many toilet brushes because I'd have to scrub and scrub and scrub until the bristles were totally brown.

That's over now.

settings.heading: 5. Guest-Ready Bathrooms 24/7 (Never Feel Embarrassed Again)
settings.text:
I grew sick of being embarrassed by surprise guests who wanted to use the toilet— it would look like I went months between cleanings. REALLY gross!

With TrueClean, my toilet stays spotless on autopilot. No rings. No stains. No panic attack when the doorbell rings.

settings.heading: 6. Save Up to 35% & Automate Your Whole Home (Limited Time)
settings.text:
One bathroom or four — TrueClean makes it easy to cover your whole home.

1 Toilet: $39 (6-month supply)
2 Toilets: $69 — Save 30%
3 Toilets: $99 — Save 35%

For less than one plumber visit, every toilet in your home stays spotless for six months. Free shipping on all bundles.

settings.heading: 7. Plumber-Approved (Won't Destroy Your Toilet Like Tank Tablets)
settings.text:
Tank tablets sit in your tank 24/7, corroding your flapper and seals.

TrueClean is different. The cleaning solution flows directly to the bowl — only when you flush. It never touches your tank, your flapper, your seals, or your valves.

That's why TrueClean is plumber-approved and safe for septic systems.

settings.heading: 8. Safe for Your Home (No Harsh Chemicals or Toxic Fumes)
settings.text:
TrueClean works without toxic off-gassing. 

✅ Septic-safe
✅ Safe around kids and pets
✅ No bleach smell lingering for hours

Enjoy a clean toilet without compromising your home or your family's health.

settings.heading: 9. Your 90-Day Scrub Free or Your Money Back Guarantee
settings.text:
If you don't see results, you don't pay. Full refund, no questions asked.

Use it for 90 days. If your toilet isn't staying cleaner with less effort, send it back. We'll return every penny.
